group_1.textRight: I am not sure I understand,@but please tell me if you hear anything.
That voice, that's the voice of the person who threw@the stone.
And the other voice is the mayor who was just elected...?

group_1.textLeft: It sounds like all the people who started this incident@are gathering.

group_1.textRight: Charu,@do you know who the malice is coming from...?

group_1.textLeft: Probably...the mayor...@I can't use my power anymore...

group_1.narration: As for aiding Magical Girls,@since both my daughter and niece are involved,@I'm going to believe in my little brother's story@and support him.

Just recently, I was forced to revise my thinking,@and despite my reluctance, I concede the necessity@of securing trustworthy means to protect the Magical Girls@in advance of their existence becoming known.
Excuse me, I need to take this call.
*Sigh*@He talks too much about his own agenda.@If we were both politicians we could be allies,@but as a doctor, we can only share common interests.
Yes, just like dealing with the police or criminals...
Speaking of,@keep an eye on the police and criminals in Mizuna.
There's a lot of people involved@in pinning these false accusations on the east@for everyone's benefit.
I'm sure the director is well aware by now@after being hit with that stone,@but soon, he won't be able to quell them.

group_1.textLeft: I never would have imagined it,@but the west side really is scheming...
Scheming... You mean Kamihama's leader@is deceiving everyone, then...?

group_1.textRight: No wonder there's such a disgusting smell@coming from them...

group_1.textLeft: If evil takes over like it once did in the Tokime clan,
everyone will be complicit with evil deeds@without even knowing it...
When Mikoshiba was the pillar of the village,@we were the same way...

group_1.textRight: Like how I was made to be an assassin...

group_1.textLeft: All of this was arranged,@so the east was just being used again...?
It looks like they figured out they were wiretapped...
